title: HTTPS SSL is not working anymore in 2.7.1.Final

labels.name: triage/duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

body:
### Describe the bug

It works in 2.6.3.Final. When I update to 2.7.1.Final, it doesn't work anymore. It can't find the certificates.
It works if I switch back to 2.6.3.Final.

### Expected behavior

It should work like before.

### Actual behavior

It doesn't work.

### How to Reproduce?

I place certificate.crt and private.key to META-INF folder and set up the application.properties file as below.

```
quarkus.http.ssl.certificate.files=META-INF/certificate.crt
quarkus.http.ssl.certificate.key-files=META-INF/private.key
```
